ZingerLittleBee/dockerman.app

Docker management interface built with Tauri and Rust

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Tool for managing Docker containers and images from a web interface
  • Monitors Docker containers with auto-restart and alerts
  • Terminal interface for Docker setup and app management
  • Docker client for Linux built with Rust and Tauri
  • tool for running and managing self-hosted apps with Docker
  • Manager for docker compose stacks
  • Windows ARM in Docker containers for devices like Raspberry Pi
  • Exposes Docker containers as Tailscale services
  • Terminal interface for managing Docker containers
  • terminal UI for managing Docker containers, inspired by k9s
